entry.title: Welcome to r/VelocityNvim!
entry.content:
ðŸŽ‰ **Welcome to r/VelocityNvim!**
This is the official subreddit for VelocityNvim - a native vim.pack based Neovim distribution focused on performance and transparency.
ðŸš€ **What is VelocityNvim?** - Native vim.pack architecture (no plugin manager overhead) - 0.16s average startup time - Modern LSP integration with Neovim 0.11+ - 25 carefully selected plugins - Rust-powered performance tools
ðŸ“º **Getting Started:** - [Installation Video](https://youtube.com/@VelocityNvim) - [Documentation](https://github.com/Maik-0000FF/VelocityNvim) - [Latest Release](https://github.com/Maik-0000FF/VelocityNvim/releases)
ðŸ’¬ **Join the Discussion:** Feel free to ask questions, share your experience, or suggest improvements!
ðŸ”— **Links:** - GitHub: https://github.com/Maik-0000FF/VelocityNvim - Landing Page: https://maik-0000ff.github.io/VelocityNvim/
